name: Kylin Video
summary: Kylin Video is a powerful video player, which supports most of the audio and video formats. Functions of shortcut keys/ preview/ screenshot/ sound settings/ subtitles and so on are provided.
description: Qt5 Mplayer and MPV front-end, with basic features like playing videos and audios to more advanced features. It supports both x86 and ARM platform, and supports most of the audio and video formats.
